|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;JS28F160C3BD70; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Mira;P2V64S40ETP-G6; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips -->

|exp_if_types = SFP |exp_sfp_num = 2

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 11/2007 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Marvell]] 88E6218 :Switch Controller w/ Embedded ARM9E @150MHz *Flash/RAM: 16MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 64MB SDRAM *LAN: 24x Fast Ethernet (RJ45) 802.3af PoE Ethernet ports, :2x Gigabit (RJ45) Ethernet ports :2x GbE Shared RJ45/SFP slots, :12.8Gbps switching capacity, Rack mountable (1U, 19") *PoE: 802.3af (PoE), 170W PoE budget
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:TRENDnet TPE-224SW.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:TRENDnet TPE-224WS B1.1R.jpeg|PCB, PSU File:TRENDnet TPE-224WS B1.1R Main.jpeg|Main board File:TRENDnet TPE-224WS B1.1R Power Top.jpeg|PoE board top File:TRENDnet TPE-224WS B1.1R Power Bottom.jpeg|PoE board bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
